ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p:
Matthew Cotten and My VT Phan acknowledge support from the Virus Genomics group at the
10.13039/100010269 Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute
. Sir Ali Zumla is a member of the Pan-African network for Rapid research, Response and Preparedness for Infectious Diseases Epidemics (PANDORA-ID-NET consortium ( https://www.pandora-id.net/) and acknowledges support from the PANDORA-ID-NET RIA2016E-1609 grant from The European and Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership (EDCTP2) programme. Sir Zumla is in receipt of a
10.13039/100000002 National Institutes of Health Research (NIHR)
senior investigator award.
